snippet: Tuesday’s advance was led by companies in cyclical sectors like energy.
abstract: Stock market rises for a third consecutive day, pushing the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index above 1,400 and the Nasdaq composite index above 3,000, the highest closes since early May.
lead_paragraph: Tuesday’s advance was led by companies in cyclical sectors like energy.

headline.seo: Shares Ascend for 3rd Day, Lifted by Hopes for Europe
headline.main: Buoyed by Hope for Europe, Shares Climb for 3rd Day
headline.print_headline: Buoyed by Hope for Euro, Shares Climb for 3rd Day
